original_text:
Can a man carry fire next to his chest
    and his clothes not be burned?
korean_text: 사람이 불을 품에 품고서야 어찌 그의 옷이 타지 아니하겠으며

sentences.original_text: Can a man carry fire next to his chest
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 자기 가슴에 불을 품을 수 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: and his clothes not be burned?
